about_the_game:
This is an innovative elimination game that combines classic block games with modern color art. In the game, players are immersed in a rich and colorful visual effect, enjoying a visual feast while engaging in strategic battles. Unlike traditional monochrome blocks, the blocks in this game have a rich variety of colors. Players need to cleverly apply color combination elimination rules, control the movement of blocks left and right through the AD key, change the shape of the upward arrow, and accurately lower it to the bottom, piecing together a complete row of blocks to achieve elimination points.

Each block's rotation, fall, and elimination have delicate feedback, providing players with an immersive experience. In addition, the game has added a color chain mechanism, which can link blocks of the same color together, trigger gorgeous special effects and additional points, further testing and enhancing the player's spatial imagination and real-time decision-making ability.
